item.title: Nice PHP IDE
item.description:
Recently a friend recommend me to check the PHP Storm IDE.

I must say that its a grate IDE, almost same capabilities as IntelliJ, I’v never seen a PHP IDE with this refactoring and navigation features.

So check it out.

Thank you Gal Batat for the recommendation.

Features and download is here
